import React, { Component } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { setAuthedUser } from '../actions/authedUser' class Nav extends Component { render() { const { users, authedUser } = this.props return(
  • Dashboard
  • New Question
  • Leaderboard
  • User: {users[authedUser].name}
  • this.props.dispatch(setAuthedUser(null))}> Logout
) } } function mapStateToProps({ authedUser, users }) { return { authedUser, users, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Nav)
